name: Sant Feliu contra el Diable
description:
This is a 2-player game! While you can paly as Guillem the cavalier, your friend can be  the evil incarnate that is invading Sant Feliu. 

Your duty is to fight each other for the fate of the city!

Keyboard

---As Guillem the cavalier---

WASD - Basic Movement

Space - Jump

Right click - Attack

---As the Devil in the middle---

Up & Down Keys - Rotate the Beast

J & L - Rotate Weapons

R(Hold) - Flamethrower

T(Hold)- Area Inferno

Y(Hold)- Firework Rockets

U- Falling Rockets

Gamepad
